Abstract.Para: Returns a TIFF representation of the given images using a specified compression scheme and factor.

Definition.Para: An array containing objects representing bitmap image representations.
An enum constant that represents a TIFF data-compression scheme. Legal values for compression can be found in NSBitmapImageRep.h and are described in “Constants”.
A float value that provides a hint for those compression types that implement variable compression ratios.
Currently only JPEG compression uses a compression factor. JPEG compression in TIFF files is not supported, and factor is ignored.

ResultDescription.Para: A data object containing a TIFF image representation.

Discussion.Para: If the specified compression isn’t applicable, no compression is used. If a problem is encountered during generation of the TIFF, the method raises an NSTIFFException or an NSBadBitmapParametersException.

Availability.AvailabilityItem: Available in OS X v10.0 and later.
